function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to lack of quarantine measures","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and transmission of diseases in the population","Mitigation":"Implement strict quarantine measures, provide financial support to vulnerable groups, and promote vaccination and hygiene practices","Technologies":"Remote monitoring and contact tracing apps, vaccination tracking systems, and digital health passports","People":"At-risk and vulnerable groups, general population","Owner":"Governments, public health authorities, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Negative psychosocial and economic effects of COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Adverse impact on mental health, socioeconomic status, and overall well-being of the population","Mitigation":"Provide psychosocial support, financial aid, and economic relief measures, and promote mental health awareness and resilience-building activities","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms, mental health apps, and virtual support groups","People":"General population, at-risk and vulnerable groups","Owner":"Government agencies, mental health organizations, and community support networks"},{"Description":"Difficulty in enforcement of quarantine and economic support measures","Impact":"Inadequate compliance with quarantine regulations and economic relief programs, leading to continued spread of diseases and financial strain","Mitigation":"Enhance enforcement mechanisms, improve communication and outreach efforts, and provide transparent information about support programs","Technologies":"Surveillance technologies, communication platforms, and data analytics tools","People":"General population, businesses, at-risk and vulnerable groups","Owner":"Government authorities, law enforcement agencies, and community leaders"}]}
